title.narrative: Support WASH Facilities to Drought Affected Families in Badghis Province

description.narrative: 450 families including 3150 individual will have access to drink water . 450 families including 3150 individual will have access to bathroom and latrines . 450 families including 3150 individual will have access to hygiene kits. 450 families including 3150 individual will have access to hygiene promotion training .

The proposed project is to support 450 families with 3150 people (51% male & 49% female) through Water Sanitation and Hygiene (WASH) related activities in Bala-Morghab district of Badghis province. AHDAA will be doing the ground work while CA will provide technical expertise pro-bono. CA-Afghanistan’s Program Manager will support AHDAA in project implementation, closely monitor the project, establish complaint mechanism for beneficiaries at ground level, do the reporting, engage its partner CRDSA and other agencies, especially with World Vision, to seek their support in case of any emergency and will also be lobby for the project to find back-donor funding source. CA team will also prepare communication materials based on impacts on ground. Impacts activities are going to be : - • Rehabilitation of 8 old water wells • Construct 7 new water wells • Distribute hygiene kits • Train 450 families on hygiene promotion and women's menstrual hygiene • Construct 10 bathrooms and latrines, as per the cultural norms and government standards.
